short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows accessing your organization's AlwaysOn agent from any web page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows school districts and universities to make their support content and important information available on various web pages. The extension allows staff and teachers to access their organization's AlwaysOn chatbot on different web pages to provide various forms of support (based on what is in your chatbot), including: Instructional, Training, Onboarding, General, etc.

Rather than leaving a web page to search various internal pages or knowledge bases, staff and teachers can use this extension to find contextually relevant information and support content provided by their organization directly from their current web page.
